chapters.title: Chapter 49: To Boannda
chapters.info: Nicola Treehill, p. 801 (569)—Slender, dark-haired weaver with big eyes. Approximately of age and height with Nynaeve. She intended to marry Hyran until he chose to follow Masema and got killed. She was one of the refugees from Ghealdan that Nynaeve brought out of Ghealdan on Riverserpent. See also Hyran.
